Be sure to come early for the 2 p.m. performance of Addison Trail’s fall play, “Anon(ymous),” before the Kermes, or come to the Kermes before the 7 p.m. show! Smart911

Addison Police Department
July 12, 2019 at 8:12 AM ·

DID YOU KNOW?

The Village of Addison is part of the Smart 911 network, a free service to DuPage County residents that allows families to create a Safety Profile that will contain information for 911 dispatchers to use in the event of an emergency.

Even if you’re not ready for an emergency, your cell phone can be. Once you sign up to Smart 911, first responders will be provided with important information that might better help them respond to your emergency. That information can include photos, medical issues and your current location.

Registration is simple, free and can be done online at https://www.smart911.com/. Your information is confidential and can only be viewed by the dispatcher when you dial 911.
